topic.title: Bitcoin cash deposit
topic.body: How anonymous will my bitcoins be if I buy using cash deposit?

topic.title: Can I have multiple zeroid users on a single computer?
topic.body: Can I have multiple zeroid users on a single computer?  If so, how?

1_1JWyTPszAmKMiH7D9FV8isH1aYi2rihGtL.body:
> [hotdog](#comment_19_18eNH913qX7e9vBExuMiv7qAMSRkJYNa21): like, paying someone with cash? sending cash? bank deposit?

As in, get the sellers bank details from localbitcoin, go to a local bank, and ask to deposit physical bank notes into the sellers bank account.
